overview: This is the ultimate review of the music of Genesis on record, on film and in performance. Drawing on rare concert films, and penetrating interviews with the band and the critics, this is the definitive review of the Genesis phenomenon. Featuring extensive archive film, with performance footage from Dallas, London and Liverpool, the key Genesis works from the halcyon days with Peter Gabriel through to the massive commercial successes from the Phil Collins era are re-visited and critically assessed.  The DVD features highlights from:  - I know what I like (In your Wardrobe) - Stagnation - The Knife - The Musical Box - Suppers Ready - Dance on a Volcano - In the Cage ... and more
title: Genesis The Musical Box
